name: Plowman
description:
Man Plowman was just a mild-mannered plow man, until she was bitten by the radioactive thunderstorm that killed her parents, granting her the powers of believing in her own substandard snow driving and venture capitalist piquing, enabling her to start her own snow plowing business, thus transforming her into MAN PLOWMAN (all caps), the only plow man in Plowville, where the students of Plow Elementary are gathering for a normal day of school during a terrible blizzard. Can she hold off the massive pileup of snow long enough to let through the children, or will they be lost to the frost?

It's sort of like Pac-Man, but less interesting. If there's too much snow on the streets, the children will be lost to the snow, so your job is to keep the streets as clear as possible. Try to focus on where the kids are walking to save as many of them as possible. They'll be able to manage some snow, but if they try to walk through too much, they won't be able to handle it. If you crash into another vehicle, a new plow will be ready for you immediately. A perfect score is difficult, but not impossible!
